p.span: Whitewright ISD covers 69 square miles located predominately in Grayson County with small portions in Collin and Fannin counties. We are located 18 miles east of Sherman. We are in District 9AAA for Football and 10AAA for all other UIL activities. The elementary school serves pre-kindergarten through grade 5, middle school grades 6 through 8, and high school grades 9 through 12.

span.span: To provide an environment that will encourage each student to reach his/her potential.

div.p: In Message start with school of choice in ALL CAPS: Ex. WES, WMS, or WHS
Then type message or tip and send.
